PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CableCarrierSegmentTypeCableTraySegment
PropertySetDef.Definition: An (typically) open carrier segment onto which cables are laid. HISTORY: IFC4 - NominalLength deleted. To be handled as a quantity measure

PropertyDef.Name: HasCover
PropertyDef.Definition: Indication of whether the cable tray has a cover (=TRUE) or not (= FALSE). By default, this value should be set to FALSE..
